`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.h2,{children:"A full-stack simple logistics app"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:156,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.p,{children:"This internally used app streamlines the process of managing mattress deliveries, enhancing both user experience and operational efficiency. The implementation of this app has led to a significant improvement in customer satisfaction and delivery tracking. The selected tech stack allows the app to be easily maintained and scaled to meet future requirements. It is already blazingly fast."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:158,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.h3,{children:"Key Features"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:160,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.li,{children:"Copy Delivery Address: Users can efficiently copy the delivery address with a single click. This feature minimizes manual errors and accelerates the address input process, contributing to accurate and timely deliveries."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:162,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.li,{children:"Call and Message Customer: The ability to directly call and message the customer from within the app simplifies communication. This feature facilitates quick updates, addresses inquiries, and ensures a smooth delivery experience."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:163,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.li,{children:"Mark Home Delivery as Completed: Delivery status management is streamlined by enabling users to mark mattress home deliveries as completed. This real-time update ensures accurate tracking and provides actionable insights into delivery operations."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:164,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(o.p,{children:"By combining Next.js for dynamic rendering, Tailwind CSS for responsive and visually appealing design, Prisma ORM for efficient database interactions, and Auth0 for secure user authentication, the app offers a robust, user-centric logistics management solution. The mentioned features enhance customer communication, delivery tracking, and operational efficiency, ultimately leading to improved customer satisfaction and optimized delivery processes."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/tomasmalamud/Downloads/portfolio/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-d30cc59e-132b-484d-8cd0-792103819a78.mdx",lineNumber:168,columnNumber:1},this),`
